TopicTitle: SquidCorp Surface, orbital, and atmospheric vehicles and bases

Articles.Content:
SquidCorp now proudly presents our line of rovers, bases, landers, and what-have-you. These were built in the pre-release, and may not work properly. Currently, I only have two uploaded, but here they are!

Jump Rover- Light

This rover is equipped with rocket engines, allowing long jumps or powered landings. The one shown is an older version, with nose cones where the new one has docking ports.

Download on KerbalX

 

The Ascender

A stock SSTO rocket. Because who needs wings? Has no parachutes, and instead must make a powered landing. Requires a high-quality gravity turn to make orbit. Built in 1.0.5.

Download on KerbalX
